assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7RG5YP-20-சயனோபாக்டீரியாவில் எந்த துணை நிறமியை கொண்டுள்ளது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

சயனோபாக்டீரியாவில் எந்த துணை நிறமியை கொண்டுள்ளது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

பைக்காபிலிக் புரதம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4006"},{"text":"

சான்தோபில்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4007"},{"text":"

குளோரோபில்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4793"},{"text":"

பாக்டீரியோ குளோரோபில்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4798"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7RG5YP-20-சயனோபாக்டீரியாவில் எந்த துணை நிறமியை கொண்டுள்ளது?","title":"7RG5YP-20-சயனோபாக்டீரியாவில் எந்த துணை நிறமியை கொண்டுள்ளது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
